TitleEnglish: The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen: From Villainess to Savior
SummaryEnglish: Pride Royal Ivy is only eight years old when she realizes that she's been reincarnated, destined to become the future wicked queen and final boss of an otome game. She's got it all in this new life: razor-sharp wit, boss-tier powers, and influence over the kingdom as crown princess. Determined to sow despair and destruction across the land, she... Wait, what kind of a rotten future is that?! Princess Pride decides to drop the maniacal villainess plan and protect the male love interests instead, cheating her way to saving everyone she can! Will this final boss end up earning the adoration of her kingdom?
Aliases: Higeki no Genkyō to Naru Saikyō Gedō Last Boss Joō wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.
Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.
The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen Who Will Become the Source of Tragedy Will Devote Herself for the Sake of the People

1.SummaryEnglish: The selfish crown princess changes for the better, her newfound precognition deemed the cause. Yet her father and the others don’t know the truth: she had been reincarnated.

2.TitleEnglish: The Villainous Princess Makes a Request of Her Brother
2.SummaryEnglish: Someday Stale will avenge his mother. He will get it done no matter what. If only he could remember the dream he had, would that help?

3.TitleEnglish: The Heretical Princess and the Knights
3.SummaryEnglish: When a military exercise goes wrong, Pride must spare no effort to ensure everyone returns alive.

4.TitleEnglish: The Worst Princess and the Young Man's Vow
4.SummaryEnglish: In another life, Pride's callousness resulted in tragedy and a powerful enemy. But in this life, her compassion saved those fated to die and earned her an unexpected ally.

5.TitleEnglish: The Wicked Princess and the Sword
5.SummaryEnglish: Arthur abandoned his dream to be a knight due to his embarrassing special ability. Inspired by Pride’s actions, he embraces his ambition once again.

6.SummaryEnglish: Heavy is the head that wears the crown. Pride must prove her mettle as the future queen by passing judgment on an enemy, but she worries this will set her on the road to ruin.

7.TitleEnglish: The Coldhearted Princess and the Quitter
7.SummaryEnglish: What would drive someone to desperation? The answer is as simple as it is old as time: love.

8.TitleEnglish: The Insolent Princess and the Judgment
8.SummaryEnglish: Arthur’s power to grow crops is absolutely worthless for a knight. Or is it? Pride’s actions are about to change multiple lives forever.

9.TitleEnglish: The Cruel Princess and the Criminal
9.SummaryEnglish: Pride once told a criminal to seek her out if he was ever faced with an impossible situation. That day has finally come.

10.SummaryEnglish: Pride and her friends hatch a daring plan to rescue the kidnapped children.

11.TitleEnglish: The Merciless Princess and the Order
11.SummaryEnglish: Val won’t leave anyone behind, even at the cost of his life. This time, Pride’s precognition cannot help her; this crisis has never happened before.

12.TitleEnglish: The Treacherous Princess Faces the Future
12.SummaryEnglish: Pride has changed many lives for the better, but is it truly enough to escape her destiny? She doesn’t believe so. Regardless, that won’t stop her from helping others.
